FAQ

Know What You’re Looking For? Most Requested Topics.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://ibmhackathons.theax.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/5293.png” title_text=”5293″ align=”right” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ background_enable_color=”off” min_height=”530.7px” custom_margin=”0vw||||false|false” custom_padding=”0vw||0px|||” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.1″ custom_padding=”53px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”WHAT IS A HACKATHON?” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

A hackathon is a social coding event where programmers, designers and developers collaborate to solve a problem and compete for cash prizes. It’s one part party, one part work-your-butt-off overnight battle against the clock and the competition.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”WHY WOULD SOMEONE PARTICIPATE IN A HACKATHON?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

People participate in hackathons for lots of reasons: the challenge, the creative outlet, the community collaboration, the networking, the swag…

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”WHO IS THIS EVENT FOR?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

This event is open to both participants and spectators from the community who want to cheer them on and see what the hackathon is all about.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”WHO CAN PARTICIPATE? ARE THERE ANY PREREQUISITES OR REQUIRED SKILLS?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Anyone is welcome to participate in this event. While experience coding and programming is a huge plus, teams will also need people with strong presentation skills and brilliant ideas.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”DO I NEED A TEAM?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

While you do have the option of working alone, hackathonCLT is a team event so working with others is encouraged. There are a few ways to find

teammates: You can pick your team from people you already know, find a team member via DevPost, meet them at a pre-hackathon info session.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”WILL THERE BE TRAINING?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

There is no pre-event training, but we’ll have Tresata team members on site who will be more than happy to answer your questions throughout the event. There will also be some additional information provided at the pre-event mixer, which we encourage everyone to attend.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”HOW ARE THE WINNERS SELECTED ?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

There will be an independent jury selecting the winners with a rating system: (Implementability, Financial benefits, presentation skill, Creativity).

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”How many members are there can be in a team?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

There can be maximum six members in the team including team leader.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

It’s one part party, one part work-your-butt-off overnight battle against the clock and the competition. People participate in hackathons for lots of reasons: the […]
